field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Setting the plugin mode to 'Test' allows you to test the plugin without API credentials. Please note that only fake labels will be created.

field.label: Show Method if Not Applicable
field.comment: When no valid method is available the error message below is shown

field.label: API UserId
field.comment: Please enter the API userId

field.label: API Key
field.comment: Please enter the API key
Make sure to test your filled credentials. We will search for your account ID and Organization ID

field.label: My DHL eCommerce Account ID
field.comment: Please enter your MDP account ID

field.label: Use DHL eCommerce label for manual shipments
field.comment: "Create DHL eCommerce Shipping Label" is turned on by default when creating a shipment

field.label: Multiple labels per page
field.comment: Combine multiple labels per page when downloading pdf

field.label: Send to business
field.comment: When enabled, by default labels will be created for business-to-business shipments.

field.label: Auto-enable: Shipment insurance
field.comment: Applicable to both consumer and business shipments, not available for mailbox delivery. When enabled, the selected insurance option is added to your shipments (when available).

field.label: Shipment insurance: amount
field.comment: Important: If the value of the goods exceeds â‚¬100.000, please contact our Customer Service prior to shipping.

field.label: Minimum order amount before enabling shipment insurance
Auto-enable: Reference
field.comment: Max length of reference is 15 characters

field.label: Default text for reference
field.comment: Max 15 characters

field.label: Auto-enable: Reference 2
field.comment: Max length of reference 2 is 70 characters

field.label: Default text for reference 2
field.comment: Max 70 characters

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: Enable Alternative tracking url

field.label: Alternative tracking URL
field.comment: use following codes for tracking code and postalcode insertion: {{trackerCode}} {{postalCode}}

group.label: Standard (only show if no other DHL services are available)
group.comment: Allow DHL eCommerce to show a fallback when there's an invalid configuration or when the DHL eCommerce API is unreachable.

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Extra service - No neighbour: Enabled
field.comment: Show option in checkout (if service is available)

field.label: No neighbour: Minimum order amount for no cost
field.comment: Leave empty if not applicable

field.label: Extra service - Evening: Enabled
field.comment: Show option in checkout (if service is available)

field.label: Evening: Minimum order amount for no cost
field.comment: Leave empty if not applicable

field.label: Extra service - Saturday: Enabled
field.comment: Show option in checkout (if service is available)

field.label: Saturday: Minimum order amount for no cost
field.comment: Leave empty if not applicable

field.label: Extra service - Morning: Enabled
field.comment: Show option in checkout (if service is available)

field.label: Morning: Minimum order amount for no cost
field.comment: Leave empty if not applicable

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: This only applies to B2B customers and 'Send to business by default' must be set to Yes

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Enabled
field.comment: This only applies to B2C customers and 'Send to business by default' must be set to No

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Cutoff time
field.comment: Set the cutoff time for when same day shipments are no longer available

field.label: Show after cutoff time
field.comment: Show same day option after the cutoff time is expired. By shipping with DHL Same-day delivery, you can offer your customer a next day delivery experience.

field.label: Title after cutoff time
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.label: Show after specific time
field.comment: Display the new title after the regular same day cutoff time. Recommended to set this to the same time the cutoff time of "home delivery" (when using "Delivery Times").

field.label: Title
field.comment: Leave empty to use default title

field.tooltip: This is required to use the ServicePoint selector
field.comment: Please configure your credentials for Google Maps. No Google Maps Javascript API credentials yet? Follow the instructions here on how to get the API key.
field.label: Google Maps Javascript API Key
Enabled
field.comment: Enable customers to select their preferred delivery times

field.label: In stock only
field.comment: Enable delivery times for products in stock only

field.label: Number of days
field.comment: Show the number of days ahead of time in the checkout

field.label: Transit time
field.comment: Expected number of days for delivery

field.label: Cutoff time
field.comment: Set the cutoff time for an order to be eligable for the regular transit time

field.label: Save preferred date to 'Shipping Description'
field.comment: Save the preferred shipping date to the order's 'Shipping Description' when a date is selected.

field.label: Create labels (only for DHL shipping methods, excluding mailbox and envelope)
Create mailbox labels (0.5-2kg, only for DHL shipping methods)
Create envelope labels (50-500g, only for DHL shipping methods)
Create small labels (max 10 kg, only for DHL shipping methods)
Create small-medium labels (max 20 kg, only for DHL shipping methods)
Create medium labels (max 31 kg, only for DHL shipping methods)
Print labels
field.comment: Only available if printing service has been enabled and a valid printer has been selected

field.label: Bulk status notification
field.tooltip: Displays a notification with the result of the bulk specifying the amount of successful orders and and amount of failed orders

field.label: Bulk success notification
field.tooltip: Displays a notification with the result of the bulk listing the order numbers of all the succesfull orders

field.label: Bulk error notification method
field.tooltip: Displays a notification with the result of the bulk in various degrees of information

field.label: Enable print service usage
field.comment: This only applies to printers that have been registered through the print service program

field.label: Hide download button
field.comment: only applies to the download label button in order and shipment view pages

field.label: Send tracking mail
field.comment: Automatically mail tracking information after creating a new shipment

field.label: Create shipments with DHL labels
field.comment: Automatically create new shipments with DHL labels based on order status

field.label: On order status
field.comment: Create shipment when order has this order status for the first time. Note some status don't allow shipments.

field.label: Immediately print created DHL labels
field.comment: With this feature enabled, all your automatically created labels will be sent to your printer.

field.label: Event trigger
field.comment: By default, automation is triggered on 'sales_order_save_after'. In case of conflicting behavior with other plugins, an alternative trigger moment can be used.

field.label: Show 'Make order shippable again' button
field.comment: By clicking this button the shipped qty of the order items will be reset to zero. This may conflict with third party plugins which depend on that number for further actions.

field.label: Disable house number validation for these countries
Shipment: Overwrite 'email/shipment/track.phtml'
field.comment: This allows clickable links in Track & Trace e-mails for Magento versions lower than 2.3.3

field.label: Order: ServicePoint address
field.comment: Expand ServicePoint shipping information in the order confirmation email with the full address

field.label: Invoice: ServicePoint address
field.comment: Expand ServicePoint shipping information in the invoice confirmation email with the full address

field.label: Do not apply 'free shipping' on service costs
Enable alternative API
field.comment: Enables API URL override
